Entries.default:
"You're the captain who Aeldys invited to parley. Ain't you?

"I'm to keep an eye out." He taps a finger beneath his one eye that isn't covered by a black patch.
"Are you ready to meet our commander? Aeldys has been waiting for you."
"Right this way, captain. It's my pleasure to show our honored guest around. Aye, it sure is."
"It's so I can provide you an escort when you arrive."

"Maybe. But I don't know you, and I know most of the captains in Aeldys' fleet. 

"So to be safe, I think I ought to lead you regardless."

"Well, she didn't say I had to show you right up. I'll send someone to tell her you're here. Give her some time to, erm... prepare. 

"In the meantime -" He grins sloppily as he tips his hat to you.
"You know where to find me if you change you mind, captain."
